item.title: A Minecraft Movie's Cameos Explained
item.description: A Minecraft Movie is packed with video game nods and pop culture references, including a number of cameos game players might not catch.

item.title: Anna Faris' 10 Best Movies And TV Shows
item.description: Anna Faris broke out with the Scary Movie franchise and has been a consistent comedy star in the two decades since.

item.title: "Really, Really Dumb S--t": Tom Cruise's Wild Stunts For Mission: Impossible 8 Teased By Simon Pegg
item.description: EXCLUSIVE: At this year's AwesomeCon, Mission: Impossible star Simon Pegg offers a blunt assessment of Tom Cruise's Final Reckoning stunt work.
